caption.p: Bootstrapped mean (dot) and 95% confidence interval (line) for each trait at each study site. LA, leaf area (cm 2); LT, leaf thickness (mm); LDMC, leaf dry matter content (g/g); SLA, specific leaf area (cm 2/g); %C, % carbon content of leaves (%); %N, % nitrogen content of leaves (%); %P, % phosphorus content of leaves (%); C:N, carbon:nitrogen; N:P, nitrogen:phosphorus; δ 13C, carbon 13 isotope ratio (‰); δ 15N, nitrogen 15 isotope ratio (‰).
